name: Sealed Life, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions as sealed life, except it additionally provides the benefits of death ward and renders its targets immune to effects that extract or transfer its soul, such as possession and trap the soul. This spell prevents a soul from returning to its body if it has already departed, until the spell's duration expires.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同命力封印（Sealed Life）一般，不过它还能够额外提供防死结界（Death Ward）的效果，而且还能够使目标获得免疫抽取（extract）或转移（transfer）自身灵魂的效果，比如占据术（Possession）和锢魂术（Trap the Soul）。若目标的灵魂已经离开身体，那么直至法术的持续时间结束为止，该法术还能够防止灵魂返回到它的体内。
